sections.title: OTC - ACTIVE INGREDIENT SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>Coffea cruda 6C HPUS</paragraph>
                  <paragraph>Active ingredient**: See product name on front panel (contains 0.443 mg of the active ingredient per pellet).</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Coffea cruda 6C HPUS Active ingredient**: See product name on front panel (contains 0.443 mg of the active ingredient per pellet).

sections.title: OTC - STOP USE SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Stop use and ask a doctor </content>if symptoms persist for more than 3 days or worsen.
 </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Stop use and ask a doctor if symptoms persist for more than 3 days or worsen.

sections.display: OTC - PREGNANCY OR BREAST FEEDING SECTION
sections.title: OTC - PREGNANCY OR BREAST FEEDING SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">If pregnant or breast-feeding, </content>ask a health professional before use.
 </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use.

sections.display: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION
sections.title: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Keep out of reach of children.</content>
                  </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Keep out of reach of children.

sections.title: DOSAGE & ADMINISTRATION SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>Adults and children: At the onset of symptoms, dissolve 5 pellets under the tongue 3 times a day until symptoms are relieved or as directed by a doctor. </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Adults and children: At the onset of symptoms, dissolve 5 pellets under the tongue 3 times a day until symptoms are relieved or as directed by a doctor.

sections.title: SPL UNCLASSIFIED SECTION
sections.text_xhtml:
Do not use if pellet dispenser seal is broken.
Contains approx 80 pellets.
How to dispense pellets? Turn tube upside down. Twist until 5 pellets are dispensed into cap. Carefully remove the cap and use it to pour pellets under the tongue.
*CLAIMS BASED ON TRADITIONAL HOMEOPATHIC PRACTICE NOT ACCEPTED MEDICAL EVIDENCE. NOT FDA EVALUATED.
*C,K,CK, and X are homeopathic dilutions: see BoironUSA.com/info for details.
sections.text_plain: Do not use if pellet dispenser seal is broken. Contains approx 80 pellets. How to dispense pellets? Turn tube upside down. Twist until 5 pellets are dispensed into cap. Carefully remove the cap and use it to pour pellets under the tongue. *CLAIMS BASED ON TRADITIONAL HOMEOPATHIC PRACTICE NOT ACCEPTED MEDICAL EVIDENCE. NOT FDA EVALUATED. *C,K,CK, and X are homeopathic dilutions: see BoironUSA.com/info for details.
